pkgmetadata.longdescription: Online Bayesian Methods for Change Point Analysis // It implements the online Bayesian methods for change point analysis. It can also perform missing data imputation with methods from 'VIM'. The reference is Yigiter A, Chen J, An L, Danacioglu N (2015) doi:10.1080/02664763.2014.1001330. The link to the package is https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=onlineBcp.
